title: EvaluationIndexSelectorResponse
description: LLM response selecting evaluation-worthy customer utterance indices from a sales conversation transcript.

selected_indices.description: Ordered list of selected customer utterance indices with justification.

index.description: The utterance index from the transcript (the number inside [brackets]).

reason.description: Brief justification for why this utterance is evaluation-worthy. Reference the specific selection criterion it satisfies.

phase.description: The conversation phase this utterance falls within, as indicated by the phase markers in the transcript.
